meaning_str.bing:
v. 想；设想；想像；认为
网络. 想象；幻想；料想

想象；设想；认为；幻想；推测；猜想；臆断；构思；揣摩；假定；假设；设想一下；想一想；想象一下；误以为；胡乱猜想

sogou-kaoyan.v: 想像[出现10次)];猜测[出现1次)];误以为[出现1次)]

sogou-CET6.v: 想像[出现18次)];猜测[出现2次)];误以为[出现1次)]

sogou-CET4.v: 想像[出现20次)];猜测[出现1次)]

sogou-zhongkao.v: 想像[出现94次)];猜测[出现2次)]

1.en: Imagine an animal living in an environment where, over the course of a day, he might hear some rustling in the leaves or maybe in the grass.
1.cn: 设想一只动物居住在这个样的一个环境，在一天当中它可能会听到树叶或者是草丛的沙沙声。

2.en: "I was so grateful to be living out a scene that seven years ago I'd only been able to imagine, " she said.
2.cn: 她说：“我如此感激在台湾的美好时光，七年前，这些场景只是在我的想象中。”

3.en: You mean so much to me. . . more than you could possibly to know. I can't imagine not having you in my life.
3.cn: 你或许不知道你对我来说是多么的重要，我实在无法想象我的生命中没有你。

0.en: Hard to imagine. Well, it's easy if you try, Dick.
0.cn: 难以想象。嗯，只要你肯试着想象，迪克。

1.en: You can't imagine what he is going through up there.
1.cn: 你无法想象他在那儿都经历着什么。

2.en: Yes, it is, indeed. But not in the way you imagine it. How should I imagine?
2.cn: 是的，确实脆弱，但结果并非你想象的那样。我该怎么想象？

3.en: It's kind of my vocation to imagine the unimaginable. Excuse me.
3.cn: 我的工作就是想象不可想象之事。失陪了。

4.en: You can't imagine the things that go on in that place.
4.cn: 你想象不到在那里发生的事情。

5.en: So imagine that you want people to start using hybrid cars.
5.cn: 想象你向别人推销混合动力车。

6.en: I can't imagine loving you more than I do right now.
6.cn: 我无法想象自己还能比此时此刻更爱你。

7.en: To be the first to trade with China, can you imagine it?
7.cn: 作第一个和中国做生意的人，您想象过吗？

8.en: Imagine a portrait of America showing all the food we consume.
8.cn: 想象一下由美国人消费的食物构成的画面。

9.en: And we can only imagine how difficult it must be for the First Lady.
9.cn: 我们难以想象第一夫人此时多么痛苦。

10.en: Only imagine your eyes, ears, nose, and throat are the top.
10.cn: 只是要把你的眼睛耳朵，鼻子和喉咙想象成瓶盖。

11.en: But no one is except you. I can't imagine what you're after.
11.cn: 但除了你，没人在问，我无法想象你在追查什么。

12.en: All right. Imagine yourself in the one place you feel most at home.
12.cn: 好的，想象你正身处一个最有家的感觉的地方。

13.en: You can't imagine how frightening the modern world will seem to her.
13.cn: 你无法想象今天的世界对她会有多么可怕。嗯。

14.en: Now, imagine if the Queen wanted to kill some people, what would happen then?
14.cn: 想象一下，如果女王想要杀人，会怎么样？

15.en: Imagine you're at a football game when this obnoxious guy sits next to you.
15.cn: 想象你在看一场足球赛旁边坐着一个讨厌鬼。

16.en: No, I just couldn't imagine you and Kevin hanging out. What do you…
16.cn: 没什么，我想象不出你和凯文在一起的画面。你什么…

17.en: Those trees were sacred to the Omaticaya in a way you can't imagine.
17.cn: 这些树对奥玛蒂卡亚人来说是圣物，你根本无法想象。

18.en: We killed a lot, but we saved more lives than you can possibly imagine.
18.cn: 我们杀了很多人，但我们拯救的生命多得超乎你们的想象。

19.en: I'm so sorry I lost you. I can't imagine you alone all this time.
19.cn: 对不起 我把你弄丢了。我无法想象这些年，你孤孤单单的...
